channel.title: Shengdongs on Feng Zhenbing's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Shengdongs on Feng Zhenbing's Blog

item.description: 设计 目前 redis mysql nacos存在单点故障 SD01 106.14.6.163 jsn-order-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/jsn-platform/deploy_ipeinfo_order.sh jsn-project-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/jsn-platform/deploy_ipeinfo_project.sh jsn-gateway-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/jsn-platform/deploy_ipeinfo_gateway.sh Mysql ### 查看状态 service mysqld status ### 启动mysql： service mysqld start ### 停止mysql： service mysqld stop ### 重启mysql： service mysqld restart Redis ### redis启动 /usr/local/bin/redis-server /etc/redis/6379.conf nginx /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx SD02 139.224.237.213 jsn-order-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/jsn-platform/deploy_ipeinfo_order.sh jsn-project-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/jsn-platform/deploy_ipeinfo_project.sh jsn-gateway-1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/jsn-platform/deploy_ipeinfo_gateway.sh nginx /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx Nacos ##启动 sh /home/nacos/bin/startup.sh -m standalone sentinel 非必须启动项 ##启动 sh /home/code-source/cloud/start_sentinel.
